channel.description: Recent content in Git on Welcome to dave.dev

item.title: Replacing a Network Element Config System with Git
item.description: In this post I’ll explore replacing the heart of a network operating system’s configuration mechanism with the software developers take on version control.

item.title: Git For Network Engineers
item.description: What is Git? Git is a source control manager (SCM), also known as revision control.
